ex_skill: Promptly and precisely: Deal 325~521% damage to enemies in a conical area, ignoring 32~48% of their defense.
basic_skill: Wide-area firing, commence: Every 25 seconds, deal 111~192% damage to enemies in a circular area, ignoring 20~32% of their defense.
passive_skill: Firepower upgrade, complete: Increase Attack by 14~26.6%.
sub_skill: Carefully and correctly: Upon activating EX skill, increase Critical Rate by 12.9~24.5% for 40 seconds.

ex_skill: Awakening: Supernova: Deal 700~1330% damage to one enemy, and 105~200% damage to others in a straight line. Damage increases depending on energy charge stage.
basic_skill: The Magic of Courage: Instantly reload when ammunition reaches 0. Deal 240~457% damage to one enemy.
passive_skill: A Heart to Never Give Up: Increase Attack by 14~26.6%.
sub_skill: Type: Abi-Eshuh: Change all damage to EX type. Increase damage dealt by 21.1~40.1% and EX skill damage by 8.1~15.4%.

ex_skill: Here I am: Place an amplifier increasing allies' Attack by 26.8~51% and Mystic Efficiency by 44.1~83.8% for 25 seconds.
basic_skill: So, you've made me angry?!: When amplifier ends, deal 148~281% damage plus 40~100% accumulated damage.
passive_skill: I will resist!: Increase Critical Damage by 14~26.6%.
sub_skill: Friends walking together: Increase allies' Critical Rate by 13.1~22.3% within amplifier range.
